item.title: Character help
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

nooo here ill show you mine

[code] if (playerEquipment[playerFeet] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerFeet]);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pFeet);
}
if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && (playerLook[0] != 1))
playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); // Beard
else
playerProps.writeByte(0);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(-1);
playerProps.writeWord(npcId);

	}
	// array of 5 bytes defining the colors[/code]

thats mine mabey thatll clear it up a bit

Read full topic

item.title: Character help
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

So below // array of 5 bytes defining the colors and above [code]playerProps.writeByte(playerLook[1]); // hair color
playerProps.writeByte(playerLook[2]); // torso color.
playerProps.writeByte(playerLook[3]); // leg color
playerProps.writeByte(playerLook[4]); // feet color
playerProps.writeByte(playerLook[5]); // skin color (0-6)

	playerProps.writeWord(pEmote);		// standAnimIndex
	playerProps.writeWord(0x337);		// standTurnAnimIndex
	playerProps.writeWord(playerSEW);	// walkAnimIndex
	playerProps.writeWord(0x334);		// turn180AnimIndex
	playerProps.writeWord(0x335);		// turn90CWAnimIndex
	playerProps.writeWord(0x336);		// turn90CCWAnimIndex
	playerProps.writeWord(playerSER);	// runAnimIndex[/code]

which is above playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pFeet); copy and paste [code]if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && (playerLook[0] != 1))
playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); // Beard
else
playerProps.writeByte(0);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(-1);
playerProps.writeWord(npcId);

	}[/code] there?

Read full topic

nooo above that inbetween

and

				playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pFeet);

item.title: Character help
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

In between that there is [code]playerProps.writeByte(playerLook[1]); // hair color
playerProps.writeByte(playerLook[2]); // torso color.
playerProps.writeByte(playerLook[3]); // leg color
playerProps.writeByte(playerLook[4]); // feet color
playerProps.writeByte(playerLook[5]); // skin color (0-6)

	playerProps.writeWord(pEmote);		// standAnimIndex
	playerProps.writeWord(0x337);		// standTurnAnimIndex
	playerProps.writeWord(playerSEW);	// walkAnimIndex
	playerProps.writeWord(0x334);		// turn180AnimIndex
	playerProps.writeWord(0x335);		// turn90CWAnimIndex
	playerProps.writeWord(0x336);		// turn90CCWAnimIndex
	playerProps.writeWord(playerSER);	// runAnimIndex[/code]

do i delete that and put that code in?

Read full topic

item.title: Character help
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

that is a really easy fix just do this

open up player.java and search for

				playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pFeet);

and scroll down untill you see somthing like

		// array of 5 bytes defining the colors

between that and

				playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pFeet);

put this

[code] if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && (playerLook[0] != 1))
playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); // Beard
else
playerProps.writeByte(0);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(-1);
playerProps.writeWord(npcId);

	}[/code]

if there is already somthing between those two things just replace it with that

metal

Read full topic
